text_en: A computer which is well facilitated with Jaws program is needed.
Jaws aids the PWVI to get to know what is written by voice.
Jaws is not only for knowing what is written, but a tool for reading documents or webpages as well.
Jaws assist the PWVI how to write or how to read for herself/himself without consulting any other person.
A sighted person can check if it is possible to read the result of the work using a screen.
